short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects Wikipedia URLs to Justapedia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Any time you click on a link to a "en.wikipedia.org" article, this plugin automatically goes to the coresponding article on "justapedia.org" instead.

Justapedia is the first major fork of the English Wikipedia, and it is shaping up to be a viable competitor. Please watch this video by culture expert J.J. McCullough on why Wikipedia's monopoly on information is bad: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-vmSFO1Zfo8

This plugin is not officially sanctioned by either Justapedia or Wikipedia.
